thread.title: Reliance Jio Prime membership at Rs 99
thread.title_full: Reliance Jio Prime membership at Rs 99

title: Reliance Jio Prime membership at Rs 99

organizations.name: reliance jio happy new year offer

text: > Technology Reliance Jio Prime membership at Rs 99 for a year, unlimited benefits continues till March 2018 Jio Prime Members can continue enjoying the unlimited benefits of JIO NEW YEAR OFFER until 31st March, 2018. By Deepak Gupta | Published: February 21, 2017 3:39 PM IST Comments Reliance Jio has managed to achieve 100 million subscribers in just 170 days, announced owner Mukesh Ambani at the announcement event on February 21 along with a custom-made subscription plan named Jio Prime. Reliance Jio Happy New Year Offer will be coming to its end in March 2017 and starting from April 1, the company would roll out tariff plans. However, Reliance Jio would continue offering free voice calls and offer 20 percent more data than other telecom operators, claims the company. About Reliance Jio Prime, the company has announced a personalized subscription plan, celebrating its initial 100 million subscribers. The newly introduced plan can be subscribed by paying an one-time fee of Rs 99 for a year and Jio Prime enrollment begins from March 1 till March 31, 2017. The Rs 99 Jio Prime membership offers the same benefits as offered during Reliance Jio Happy New Year promotional offer, for another 12 months. Reliance Jio Prime Members would get free voice calls with outgoing and roaming included and unlimited data benefits until March 2018. Jio Prime members can get this value at an introductory price of only Rs. 303 per month, which corresponds to just Rs 10 per day. Along with unlimited data and voice benefits, Reliance Jio Prime members would also get subscription to MyJio services such as JioTV, JioCinema, JioMusic, JioMags, JioXpressNews of worth Rs 10,000 for one full year. The Jio Prime membership can be availed by all the existing Reliance Jio customers and also who would subscribe to its network on or before 31st March 2017. Consumers can enroll into Jio Prime services from both online and offline Reliance Jio retail stores. “Today I show my gratitude to you, the initial #100MillionOnJio & to ensure you always continue to get extreme value”, said Mr Mukesh Ambani Jio Prime Members can continue enjoying the unlimited benefits of JIO NEW YEAR OFFER until 31st March, 2018. #100MillionOnJio (ALSO READ: Reliance Jio crosses 100 million users in just 170 days, faster than any other technology company in the world ) “170 days later Jio has crossed the 100-million customer mark on its 4G LTE, all IP wireless broadband networks. A heartfelt thank you to all our customers” said RIL Chairman and Managing Director Mukesh D Ambani. In his address, Ambani threw light over ‘data and value anxiety’ which had cropped up among the Indian telecom consumers due to the competitive pricing offered by leading Indian telecom operators. Published Date: February 21, 2017 3:39 PM IST comment Topics:
